step_data.thought: I need to provide a complete summary of the walking route from Times Square to Central Park based on the information displayed on the page. Looking at the accessibility tree, I can see that the directions are already displayed, showing a 3.6km route that takes 49 minutes to walk. The route consists of 21 steps with detailed turn-by-turn directions. I should send a clear and concise message to the user summarizing this information.
step_data.action: stop('I've found the shortest walking route from Times Square to Central Park. The route is 3.6km long and would take approximately 49 minutes to walk. The directions consist of 21 steps, starting on Broadway and following various streets until reaching Central Park. The complete turn-by-turn directions are displayed on the map.')
